page.title: 07ATTITUDES
page.content: I dont think that the leisure facilities are adequate because you cant do an awful lot and you get board very easily. You should have something else worth going to. You go to Barnsley baths and when you get there it isn5 worth the bus journey. If we had more to do it would keep older children off the streets. I am sick of disco's because that is all the council seem to be able to organise. Surley they could organise something different so that we could have something to do. It would cost alot to have a swimming pool or cinema built in Monk Bretton or Lundwood but it would be well worth doing. As I have said before the facilities are not very good. There is quite alot to do but it is not through swimming pools or things organised.
